titleStmt.title: To the right honourable the Knights, citizens and burgesses in Parliament assembled the humble petition of thousands of the well affected inhabitants of the cities of London and Westminster ... and places adjacent in behalfe of themselves and other well-affected persons in the Kingdome of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: For Peter Cole and John Sweeting,

notesStmt.note: "This is licensed and entered into the Hall Booke according to order: Henry Walley".
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
